CULDd575.Transcription:
Backe bent smocke rentSlipperie yt was & in yt wentThrust in
                    stiffe standinging(sic)But comes out lither droppingStiff
                    standing roughe handlingBettween a womans legges in a morning
CULDd575.Note:
‘a test’ to right of text. Formerly on a flyleaf of Formerly
                    on a flyleaf of Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Dd.5.76.
CULDd575.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 54.
